title: (03016) Alicante - 2 Avenida Villajoyosa
description: This is basic parking. Some marked spaces for standard vehicles, nothing designated for vans. However it is also possible to park anywhere along the roadside as it is not metered. Spaces can be limited at busy times. There are no real facilities apart from a bin, but if you just need a short stopover, you could do worse. Lastly, there is a hight restriction set at 2.6 metres. This however is for the lowest side if the bridge. I am about 2.9 and got under without a scrape. Just stay as far left as possible.

title: (03013) Alicante (Alacant) - 29 Calle Dato Iradier

name: AREA NATUR PLAYA
title: (03560) AREA NATUR PLAYA
description:
AREA NATUR PLAYA , New motorhome area located 200 metres from the beach, with all services nearby, supermarket, restaurants, sports activities, with a tram station 200m away that you can use to travel anywhere in Alicante. Plots from 9m to 15m long and from 5 to 7m wide, come and choose the plot you like best,

All the plots have electricity connection (optional) only if you need it, 4,5€ - 6A. and 10A - 6€.  Some plots also have water,

The free services for our customers are : Hot showers, Wifi 5G, water filling and emptying, washing facilities, picnic area and barbecue,

Laundry, washing machines and dryers are available at a cost of 4€.

Pets are welcome.

title_short: (03195) Los Arenales del Sol - 26 Calle Zamora
description: Good area to stay overnight, as an alternative to Calabassi beach, when the police tell you that you cannot stay overnight on the beach. He has a couple of traps at the end of the street to empty gray water.

title: (03320) Torrellano - 25 Circunvalación de Alicante
description: GALP gas station with water and air dispenser. The type of dispenser is trigger but the flow is medium.

title: (03195) Los Arenales del Sol - 62 Avenida San Bartolome Tir
title_short: (03195) Los Arenales del Sol - 62 Avenida San Bartolome Tir
description: Public source.

title: (03115) - 37B Diseminado Monnegre
description: Parking with view of a ravine/barranco - a good place to have a picnic lunch or park and sleep in a pinch.

name: Camping Costa Blanca
title: (03560) Camping Costa Blanca
description: Campsite Costa Blanca open all year round. Conditions for long durations. All services, restaurant, swimming pool, wifi etc..

title: (03560) El Campello - 2 Calle de los Almendros
title_short: (03560) El Campello - 2 Calle de los Almendros
description: Small car park overlooking a quiet beach

title: (03690) Sant Vicent del Raspeig - 40 Avinguda de L'Astronomia
title_short: (03690) Sant Vicent del Raspeig - 40 Avinguda de L'Astronomia
description: Small flat space to park quietly. We stay there for a picnic but certainly possible for one night. It's quiet so very good for a rest stop.

title: (03560) El Campello - 9 Carrer dels Pins
description: Public parking lot at the cemetery. Next to a train station. Parking spaces short, you may have to park across the street. We asked a few locals, they said it wasn't a problem. Stayed here from Sunday to Monday in February. Stand alone, but have met many nice people. Many let their dogs run free here. Dog droppings dispenser available. Small trash cans available, otherwise no services. Nothing special, but quiet (only the train now and then), nice people.

title: (03195) Elx - Camino del cabo
description: Quiet location stayed here overnight right close to sand Junes  it says there are restrictions for camping police swing by and didn’t bother us during the winter months

title: (03698) Agost - 128 Partida Sol del Camp
description: Parking next to the Agost train stop and the beginning of the Vía Verde del Maigmó. Site for 3 motorhomes. Every once in a while a train passes by. quiet place

title: (03560) El Campello - 1 Carrer Llobarro
description: Large expanse of land and small pebbles in a residential area. Very quiet for one night. water point at children's games.

title: (03130) Alicante - 27 Partida Balsares
description: Had parked in the parking lot because the one ahead was full to walk to the beach. Parking lot and surroundings full of garbage!! Beach is nudist and not very nice. Although beach in the water itself large stones and many algae-like round soft parts. We had the dog with a prohibition sign we didn't see it. There are also no shady places totally overcrowded at the weekend. No real recommendation unfortunately...

title: (03130) Santa Pola - 71 Carrer de Creta
description: Large car park right next to a Repsol.  50 meters to a large and beautiful dog park.  Clean.  150 meters to shops and pharmacies and more.  You can possibly spend the night here.

title: (03195) Santa Pola - Camino del cabo
description: Two very large, unpaved and somewhat bumpy car parks. There is a small road but with little traffic (practically nothing at night). In the top parking lot there is a decent telephone signal (4G), in the one near the sea it is poor (3G). The advice is to park so that everyone has space. Unfortunately, there are always bullies who get on the side and occupy three seats. Then of course they expose everything, awning, chairs, ... do this and then it will end like in Portugal. 5 km away there is the possibility of loading and unloading (regularly) for only 5 Euros.

title: (03130) el Gran Alacant - 19 Avenida de Finlandia
title_short: (03130) el Gran Alacant - 19 Avenida de Finlandia
description: Miele Self-Service Laundry. Miele Washers and Dryers. Detergents and softeners Included. Located in the Gran Alacant Shopping Center. (In front of the Parking).

title: (03130) Santa Pola - Camino del Carabasí
description: Day parking only. Night parking on the coast is prohibited; the police monitor and verbalize.

title: (03560) Campello - 88 N-332
description: AutoGas - G.L.P refiling at Repsol station.

title: (03560) Campello - 35 N-332
description: FREE point to refill water and check tire pressure. Petronor gas station

title: (03690) Urbanització el Savinar - Unnamed Road
description: Very large parking lot as a starting point for hikes and MTB. Is also easily accessible for large mobile homes up to 8m in length via a paved road. There are no prohibition signs for the parking lot - only behavioral requirements for the use of the area. See pictures. We only stayed here during the day during the low season, but we could certainly have stayed overnight.

title: () Gran Alacant - Cam. del cabo
description: Very good place to spend a few days out of season

title: (03690) - 71 Partida Boqueres Polig C
description:
Welcome to the best spot to be. 

Hi!! We offer a great pitch on our private property. 
The property is close to a beautiful mountain range with lot of trails for hiking or biking. 
Our house is about 40 mt from the spot for parking, we are happy to help on anything you need. We can provide delicious home made food if you wish. 
There isn't toilet on the spot, so only campers with their own toilet. 
You could use our toilet at home (if you are a van) but we are not always there. Better ask before planing to come. 
 Beaches are approximately 20 minutes drive away !!
Nearby San Vicente, 15min away, is a town, not touristy. Facilities include a large supermarket, banks, post office, shops, garage, bars and restaurants.
Alicante is 25 minutes away full on attractions for tourism. 
 No facilities for disposing of either grey or black water. 
We have 3 dogs, after a fence. 
Please phone me in advance or email for more information, to arrange when you would like to stay. 
Thank you and I look forward to meeting you
Best wishes Mario!!

title: (03130) Gran Alacant - Cam. del Carabasi
description: Farther than the referenced spot. It is possible to park along the road with a motorhome or a van, but the terrain is very bumpy. Sea view no beach but it is possible to swim between the rocks. Passage of the police several times but without telling us anything. Pitch for camping car and van all along the road. Can be prohibited in high season.

name: Finca Familia
title: (03113) Finca Familia
description: Finca Familia is run by a Dutch family who have made their dream come true. Thanks to the friendly atmosphere, small scale, hospitality and personal attention, you will soon feel like family. Your pets are also welcome with us. It is a mini campsite located in a quiet area with a beautiful view of the cities of Alicante and Elche. Both towns, the beach and the airport are 15-20 minutes away by car. Alenda Golf is a 5 minute drive away. We offer: showers, toilets, sinks, washing up area, WiFi, pétanque court, spacious pitches, large swimming pool with free deckchairs, possibility to empty the toilet cassette, water and a cozy common room with darts. For an additional fee, we offer a shopping service, electricity, laundry, transfers to the desired places, dog sitting service.Visit our facebook page minicampingfincafamilia or contact us without obligation. Do you want to come and visit us? Of course we like it ;-) Because navigation sometimes requires our guests to drive on impassable roads, we strongly advise you to contact us beforehand. We can then provide you with the correct route so that you arrive without problems. We look forward to welcoming you to our Finca, Sincerely, Finca Familia ☀.

title: (03130) Santa Pola - 37 Camino del cabo
description: Parking in front of beach for dogs.

title: (03690) Urbanització el Savinar - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful spot with great views. Best to get there from Tibi, then it works with vans and smaller motorhomes. BUT getting there from Urbanització el Savinar it is ONLY recommended to go with a 4x4 and raised in small vans. Absolutely no CCs. Very small, steep and washed out gravel (see 4th pic).

title: (03130) Santa Pola - Camino del cabo
description: Location next to a small beach and rock to be able to fish. There are other places all along this road but there really good. We just spent 2 quiet nights there. A little walker and people on the beach but at this time the top. The Guardia Civile came by several times and said nothing. Just above behind you, there is a viewpoint to see (20min by car) super beautiful landscape, on the 3rd photo seen from the mirardor, the spot is to the left of the photo after the trees, 4th photo the viewpoint

title: (03130) Gran Alacant -
description: Very quiet free parking. Hikers area where we can visit military installations from the Spanish Civil War, the Santa Pola lighthouse and a spectacular viewpoint where we will see the island of Tabarca.

title: (03560) El Campello - 107 Carrer Orxeta
description: "Coveta Fumá" Small quiet parking by the sea, no convenience around, perfect for sleeping, access is via small streets not very wide

title: (03130) Santa Pola - Faro del Cabo de Santa Pola
title_short: (03130) Santa Pola - Faro del Cabo de Santa Pola
description: Place in the countryside close to Miradors del Far, Cape Santa Pola. Many different places and flat to land along the path to the lighthouse (Faro del Cabo de Santa Pola). No services on site, and very little network (edge) at the end of the road because of the radar antennas. No height / width limit.

address.street: Faro del Cabo de Santa Pola

title: (03111) Busot - 6 Carrer del Pal
description: Very flat parking on asphalt

title: (03111) Busot - 1A Carrer del Pal
description: Parking at the foot of Busot Castle. Ample asphalt space and with sidewalks. Night lighting, different containers, public toilets, nearby playground ... Very quiet place near the historic center as well as restaurants and other services. Perfect place for MTB / Hiking. Visit Canelobre and Cabeçó d'Or caves.

title: (03130) Santa Pola - 23 Camino del cabo
description: Nice place with views of Tabarca Island. Small sandy beach. There are no signs prohibiting the parking of motorhomes

name: Camper Oase Puravida
title: (03139) Camper Oase Puravida
description: Camper Oase Puravida offers space for 3 campers with spacious pitches and a beautiful view in a green valley. Cross Cami de Luna. Nice sanitary facilities. Petanque ground available. A nice place to stay. The area offers excellent opportunities for hiking and cycling. Supermarket available. The baker arrives. Health Pola and beach 6 km. Elche and Alicante can be visited within a good distance by bike, public transport or car. Please call or email ahead, limited seating.

title: (03130) Santa Pola - 23 Avinguda Catalanet
description: Small car park between 2 others. Right on the beach with the mountain backdrop. No services but fairly calm. Forbidden to stay at night

title: (03111) Busot - 7 Carrer del Pal
description: Quiet and very flat corner on earth

title: (03130) Santa Pola - 22 Partida Bancal de la Arena
title_short: (03130) Santa Pola - 22 Partida Bancal de la Arena
description: Large parking in front of the beach behind the road. To spend the night seems to be legal, several police cars are passed, it is tolerated to be here. The whole side of the road towards the sea seems to be closed and therefore impossible to stay at night. Plants and trees are installed on the old car parks. The police pass frequently. This place is nothing special but you are alone, 100 m from the sea and on the "mountains" behind you, a lighthouse protects the coast.

title: (03679) Montforte del Cid - Calle F Sector Ubz-6
title_short: (03679) Montforte del Cid - Calle F Sector Ubz-6
description: Picnic area with beautiful views on a pilgrim route. fairly steep climb. There is a playground and water and several picnic tables. Shaded trees present. waste container present. possibly crowded by families on weekends.

title: (03698) Agost - 62 Partida Sol del Camp
description: Picnic area and large parking area with immediate access to the Via Verde De Maigmó. Possibly busy during holidays and weekends. Large town of Agost within easy walking distance for bars, restaurants and shops. Lidl supermarket at 12km. Tranquil location, great for cycling and walking with lovely views. An undiscovered little paradise.

title: (03111) - 5B Calle Serra la Grana
description: Camper villa: La Finca. Private plot of 12,000m2 with a house under construction. Quiet, walking distance (20 minutes) from Busot. Beautiful views to Alicante (sea) and the mountains. Camper places on different terraces. No shadow! One of the comments from (driving by) travelers states that the site is under development, but that is incorrect. Part of the site is private (house under construction and swimming pool) and part of the site has been cleaned for the reception of campers. Do you like peace and nature? Are you completely self-sufficient? Then this is the place for you! If we are not there for a while, please call (for example WhatsApp) and we will open the gate or give you the code. Bye! Address: Els Planets 6, Busot.

title: (03130) Santa Pola - Camino del Cementerio nuevo de Santa Pola
title_short: (03130) Santa Pola - Camino del Cementerio nuevo de Santa Pola
description: Parking at the cemetery ... nice and quiet

address.street: Camino del Cementerio nuevo de Santa Pola

title: (03139) Barri Alt - 1032A Partida Valverde Alto
description:
Small-scale camper place for max 5 campers.
Beautifully situated between Santa Pola and Elche, both places are 7 km away and easily accessible by bike.
Supermarket and restaurants less than 2km.
Please call in advance for availability.
Not suitable for children under 12 years!
NB! Water and empty waste water tank or toilet only for guests! Minimum stay 2 nights!

title: (03560) El Campello - 16B Diseminado Diseminados
description: A small place to stay. The site is close to railroad tracks and not too far away is an expressway. You can still sleep as long as you are not a very light sleeper. Ideal for a stopover. Caution. The street a few meters further is a place by the sea. Depending on the weather, the ground there is impassable. 20-30cm deep clay mud.

title: (03130) Santa Pola - 4 Camino del cabo
description: Here you are right next to the sea. The road is not busy. WARNING! A few meters further, an area begins where overnight stays with motorhomes are expressly prohibited (with signage). Here, he is apparently still allowed.

title: (03139) Valverde - 2050 Partida Valverde Bajo
description: Place to park and spend the night, has a supermarket next door and near a bus stop that takes you to the beaches. It is the parking lot of the supermarket and the owners allow you to spend the night, a good place to spend the night if you are on the way to somewhere

title: (03130) Santa Pola del Este - 1 Calle Milán
title_short: (03130) Santa Pola del Este - 1 Calle Milán
description: Spent the night here, no disturbances, . very nice.

title: (03100) Valle del Sol - Unnamed Road
description: If you like isolation and nature, you've come to the right place. Large platform with the possibility of staying day and night, no bans. 3 or 4 places available requiring wedging. Magnificent view of the surrounding mountains and the canyon of various colors. A spectacle that nature offers you so respect this place. Hikes possible in the gorges with proper footwear.

title: (03130) Polígono Industrial - 9 Calle los Arrieros
description: Quiet industrial poligono tarred flat parking No service Accessible to any size motorhome Ideal for dogs

title: (03130) Santa Pola - 29 Calle los Electricistas
description: Discounts for 1, 3, 6 and 12 months.

title: (03130) Santa Pola - 1 Calle los Marineros
description:
Gas refill. The Polagas have their own adapter for Finnish side loaded gas bottles. The gas station staff refilled two of our Finnish gas bottles.
Fill all bottles except Spanish ones.
GPL mixture is 80% propane, 20% butane.

title: (03111) Busot - 4 Camí de la Partida Pla de Cabeçó
title_short: (03111) Busot - 4 Camí de la Partida Pla de Cabeçó
description: Safe and secure place to park overnight for cycling, climbing etc.

address.street: 4 Camí de la Partida Pla de Cabeçó

title: (03109) Urbanització Bon Aire -
description: Very quiet and beautiful spot on an abandoned orchard. flat serfice with room for around 4 vans. not recommended for motorhomes as the 30m of dirt track is quite rough. Close to the old abandoned dam that is worth a visit.

title: (03130) Santa Pola - Paseo Vicealmirante Blanco G
title_short: (03130) Santa Pola - Paseo Vicealmirante Blanco G
description: A small usable off-season beach parking.

title: (03139) Elx - Travesía del camino viejo de Elche a Santa Pola
title_short: (03139) Elx - Travesía del camino viejo de Elche a Santa Pola
description: Free Elche River Safari Parking, very quiet at night, perfect for visiting the Safari

address.street: Travesía del camino viejo de Elche a Santa Pola

title: (03130) Santa Pola - 6 Calle Lérida
description: Laundrette inside a Carrefour. Ideal for washing whilst shopping. Car park has spaces for larger vehicles on the upper level.

name: Camping Bahia de Santa Pola
title: (03130) Camping Bahia de Santa Pola
description: Camping "bahia" in Santa Pola Bay, located next to the natural area of Las Salinas, where you can see a large number of birds.

title: (03679) Montforte del Cid - 18 Calle E Sector Ubz-4
title_short: (03679) Montforte del Cid - 18 Calle E Sector Ubz-4
description: Quiet parking in a dead end street on the outskirts. no houses, only field, ideal for a night in transit.

title: (03100) Xixona - 6 Arrabal S U Ind S-ixa y Espart
title_short: (03100) Xixona - 6 Arrabal S U Ind S-ixa y Espart
description: This is the private car park of the Turron El Lobo museum. Very interesting visit but in Spanish. A small explanatory film still in Spanish that it is possible to have in French at the end of the visit. Tasting of some products and shop for possible purchases.

address.street: 6 Arrabal S U Ind S-ixa y Espart

title: (03130) Santa Pola - 12 Carrer Llevant
description: Aldi car park. Laundromat and toilets in Carrefour store opposite. Near the market square and the city center

title: (03130) Santa Pola - 1 Calle Gerona
description: Unrestricted parking, close to Macdonals and supermarkets.

title: (03130) Santa Pola - 38 CV-865
description: Parking and surroundings of the awesome Santa Pola skate park. Bar and snacks. Shower and toilet available until 11:30 p.m.

title: (03202) Elx - 10 Carrer José Antonio Cañete Juárez
title_short: (03202) Elx - 10 Carrer José Antonio Cañete Juárez
description: Parking area for any vehicle, safe and quiet, next to police headquarters, park, shopping center, sports city.

name: Finca La Signatura
title: (03139) Finca La Signatura
description: Finca La Signatura. A little paradise for holidaymakers with 3 spacious, bushed areas for motorhomes or caravans. Beautiful large swimming pool, trampoline and a bowling alley. Nice and clean sanitary facilities. Anne and Nick make you feel welcome on this beautiful and peaceful finca nestled between the plantations. There is also a holiday home and guest room. Overall a lovely place to stay. The area is flat so excellent for cycling, 6 km from the beach and 7 km from the palm city of Elche. Shops in the immediate vicinity. Due to the limited number of places, calling/Whatsapp in advance is recommended.

title: (03130) Santa Pola - 68 Carrer d'Elx
description: Fresh water tap in park

title: (03130) Santa Pola - 54 Calle Zamora
description: Large deserted gravel area along the stadium. Near the Mac Donalds. Just arrived we had the visit of the local police (23:30) for a control. Friendly welcome, informing us that we can rest safe because we are behind their police station.

title: (03109) Tibi -
description: Shared parking with some hikers,  where you can park without restrictions, motorhomes are normally allowed to stay one overnight. Very close to the Tibi reservoir.  You can spend the day and the night without any problem.  It can be reached by a very narrow road and a few metres of track.

title: (03130) Santa Pola - 9 Carretera Elche-Santa Pola
description: Parking next to the big market, quiet, relatively flat, a few holes, a few trees, very good...

title: (03100) Xixona - 315 Diseminado Sector 5
description: Very quiet place surrounded by nature, access is by a fairly narrow road, esplanade for about 5 vans.

title: (03130) Santa Pola - 10 Avinguda Portus Ⅱ - Licitanus
title_short: (03130) Santa Pola - 10 Avinguda Portus Ⅱ - Licitanus
description: Great parking very central, not possible to use it on market days. It is next to the health center. Very quiet to sleep. In spite of the fact that in this town the Motorhomes are not welcome. They still confuse the issue of parking and camping ... Anyway ... I've been using it for years.

name: Wash in Blue
title: (03130) Wash in Blue
description: Laundromat: Wash in Blue

title: (03560) Aiguë - 23 CV-775
description:
Just in front of the Area Ricreativa Victoria Rojas. No services. Just flat parking on dirt across few terrasses.
BBQ and WC in the picnic area just in front.

title: (03291) Elche - 65 Camino de la Cantera de Santa María
title_short: (03291) Elche - 65 Camino de la Cantera de Santa María
description: Parking Mariano Ros, without lettering and service. Near El Cau

address.street: 65 Camino de la Cantera de Santa María

title: (03202) Elche - Avinguda de la Universitat d'Elx
title_short: (03202) Elche - Avinguda de la Universitat d'Elx
description: Parking in a quiet area, near sports area and supermarkets. with some shade depending on the time of day

title: (03130) Santa Pola - 13 Avenida Valencia
description: Grand playa Laundry.

title: (03569) Aguas de Busot -
description: Small esplanade to sleep peacefully.

title: (03130) Santa Pola - 30 Avenida Zaragoza
description: Parking of the Theme Park "Pola Park" parking area without limitation of size, spoken with park staff, parking and overnight stays are allowed for motorhomes. Very quiet area, but at the end of the parking lot there is a national road with a lot of traffic, it is better to spend the night near the local road.

title: (03130) Santa Pola - Avenue Vincente de Blasco Ibanez
title_short: (03130) Santa Pola - Avenue Vincente de Blasco Ibanez
description: It is a residential area, many streets, many parking lots, you can spend the night, nearby services, but be very careful, gypsies, and motorhomes bother them a lot if they are more than 2 days, there is a national law but according to the city council they are above that instruction and there is a real dictatorship when it comes to parking and staying overnight.

title: (03111) Busot - CV-776
description: 3 places Special for climbers

title: (03569) Aigües - 10 Camí Real
description: Ground parking in cozy village, some Saturday market stalls. 15 min. of the beach. leveling ground. La Ladito water source.

title: (03130) Santa Pola - 88 Avinguda Vicente Blasco Ibañez
title_short: (03130) Santa Pola - 88 Avinguda Vicente Blasco Ibañez
description: Good parking for kitesurfing.

title: (03109) Tibi - 16 Autovía del Mediterráneo
description: We made a stop on our route is this area. It is a large parking lot next to the BP gas station with a part of asphalt and a part with a lot of shade of pine trees just behind the Maigmó restaurant. Quiet area with a large pine forest ideal for a while to rest and eat something. No services other than those of the restaurant itself.

title: (03569) La Cava -
description: Super quiet place in the heart of Aigües pine forest, It is located two minutes walk from the famous abandoned preventorio of Aigües which can be visited. There are also several hiking and mountain biking routes. we have spent 2 nights and no problem, the access road is dirt but in perfect condition.
